enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.help: Default: True. Will disable if an error occurs; otherwise set to disable to disable plugin

version.label: Version
version.help: Version of the plugin in the plugin.json file

program_thumbnail.label: Program Thumbnail
program_thumbnail.help: Default: featuredImage. M3U8 only used with subscriptions.  TVHeadend has bugs with the M3U8 file from PlutoTV. ffmpeg uses ffmpeg and ffprobe.  Internal is the most efficient and cleanest solution.

channel-thumbnail.label: Channel Thumbnail
channel-thumbnail.help: Default: colorLogoPNG. M3U8 only used with subscriptions.  TVHeadend has bugs with the M3U8 file from PlutoTV. ffmpeg uses ffmpeg and ffprobe.  Internal is the most efficient and cleanest solution.

player-tuner_count.label: tuner_count
player-tuner_count.help: Default: 10. Number of streams active at one time

player-send_atsc_keepalive.label: Send ATSC Keep-Alive
player-send_atsc_keepalive.help: Default: False. For internalpproxy, when the provider stops sending packets or the stream is being filtered for 15 seconds, will send a ATSC keep-alive msg to client

epg-hours.label: EPG Hours to Pull
epg-hours.help: Default: 14. PlutoTV max is 14 hours including 2 hours in the past.
